sentences.sContent: The factory was to be a showpiece of Western investment in the East.
sentences.sCn: 这家工厂将成为西方在东方投资的样板。

trans.tranCn: 陈列品； 展品， 样品
trans.tranOther: A showpiece is something that is admired because it is the best thing of its type, especially something that is intended to be impressive
